l:dependency.name: IBM z/OS Connector
l:dependency.l:description: IBM z/OS FTP Connector - bunch of tools for integration with IBM z/OS

l:dependency.name: Commons Net
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Net library contains a collection of network utilities and protocol implementations. Supported protocols include: Echo, Finger, FTP, NNTP, NTP, POP3(S), SMTP(S), Telnet, Whois
